definition: by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Encourage her release by constructing an erotic fantasy before things heat up.
sentences.chinese: 应当在高潮激发前鼓励她通过性幻想放松自己。

sentences.english: Perhaps he earned the money through ill means.
sentences.chinese: 或许他的钱是通过卑劣的手段挣来的。

sentences.english: The script could be improved by displaying the picks in a Keno-style board.
sentences.chinese: 可以通过在基诺样式板中显示选择结果来改进脚本。

sentences.english: Fourth, solve problems through consultation on an equal footing, instead of imposing restriction at will.
sentences.chinese: 通过平等协商解决问题，不要动辄设限和制裁。

sentences.english: These are usually associated with a major publisher and a strong brand.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过与一个大型的发行商和很强的品牌相关联。

sentences.english: The tolls, which include a government passage tax, varied from $4 to $30 per vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 隧道收费连政府通过税，每程由4元至30元不等。

sentences.english: A spectrum is then obtained and telemetered to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 然后记录它的光谱，并将数据通过遥测系统发回地面。

sentences.english: By means of high - temperature curing, the curing period of lime - fly ash stabilized bound macadam is shortened.
sentences.chinese: 通过高温养生手段缩短二灰稳定碎石的养生龄期。

sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通过专项整治，再现京城水系和古典园林的历史风貌。

sentences.english: Through the trial, was initially arrested the two men and Lim Yang.
sentences.chinese: 通过审讯，最初被抓获的两男子为任某和杨某。

sentences.english: The copolymer was wet spun to get flame-retardant fiber.
sentences.chinese: 将共聚物通过湿法纺丝，得到了阻燃纤维。

sentences.english: The secondary screens receive the coal from the crushers and remove the fines.
sentences.chinese: 经压碎后的煤通过第二道筛，筛出细粉。

sentences.english: Most global transactions are carried out by a letter of credit (LC).
sentences.chinese: 大多数全球交易都是通过信用证白勺方式完成。

sentences.english: He and his family will also be getting food from the charity.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的家人也将通过慈善组织获得食物。

definition: to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to draw support from/with the help of
to exploit/to make use of/to use/to take advantage of/to utilize
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
